title: Learning Design Based on Trends in English for Specific Purposes (ESP) Research

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced domain knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based digital tools and formative assessment-centered feedback

learning_goals: Learners can apply genre analysis techniques by professional field to write practical documents.
Learners can derive vocabulary usage patterns by field using data-driven language analysis tools.
Learners will establish ESP (English for Specific Purposes) learning strategies tailored to their own needs according to learner-centered design principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
